problem_text: Use rectangle L M N P, parallelogram L K M J to solve the problem. If m \angle L M P = m \angle P M N, find m \angle P J L.
compact_text: Use rectangle LMNP, parallelogram LKMJ to solve the problem. If m \angle LMP = m \angle PMN, find m \angle PJL.
annotat_text:
Use rectangle LMNP, parallelogram LKMJ to solve the problem.
If $m \angle L M P=m \angle P M N,$ find $m \angle P J L$
